MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH8 postcode area of Holywell, affecting properties in Sundawn Avenue and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  06.36am. Our engineers have arrived on site in the local area and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 09.45am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 07.54am on 14th April 2021.
